name: prometheus
description: Prometheus is a leading open-source system monitoring and alerting toolkit. It collects metrics via pull-based scraping, stores them efficiently, and uses PromQL for powerful queries and visualizations.

features.title: Metric Collection
features.description: Scrape metrics from instrumented applications and infrastructure using pull-based model

features.title: Time
features.description: Store metrics efficiently with compression and retention policies for long-term data

features.title: Promql Queries
features.description: Write powerful queries using PromQL to analyze and aggregate metric data

features.title: Kubernetes Ready
features.description: Automatically discover and monitor targets using Kubernetes, Consul, and other integrations

features.title: Email Notifications
features.description: Define alert conditions that trigger notifications when thresholds are exceeded

features.title: Multi
features.description: Label metrics with key-value pairs for flexible filtering and aggregation

features.title: Analytics Dashboard
features.description: Built-in expression browser and integration with Grafana for creating dashboards

features.title: Federation
features.description: Aggregate metrics from multiple Prometheus servers for centralized monitoring
